events.message: Hello, I just received my order and the laptop screen is cracked and has several scratches on it. This is very disappointing.
The reported issue has been categorised as a product defect due to the broken and scratched laptop screen.
Your case has been assigned to one of our technical support agents who will assist you shortly.
Hello, this is Alex from support. Iâ€™m sorry to hear your laptop arrived damaged. Let me assist you with this.
Could you please provide photos of the cracked screen and any visible scratches so we can verify the damage?
I have attached several photos showing the cracked screen and deep scratches. This is unacceptable for a new product.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I would like to proceed with the replacement unit. Please let me know the next steps for the exchange process.
We have arranged for a replacement laptop to be shipped to your address. You will receive a tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement laptop and that it is in good condition. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
